title: I Was Raised After Being a Mermaid - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Romance   Sci-fi   Shounen Ai
tags: Beasts   Charismatic Protagonist   Charming Protagonist   Cute Children   Cute Protagonist   Doting Love Interests   Fast Learner   Futuristic Setting   Generals   Handsome Male Lead   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Language Barrier   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Military   Mpreg   Non-humanoid Protagonist   Possessive Characters   Psychic Powers   Royalty   Singers   Slow Romance   Special Abilities   Stoic Characters   Strong Love Interests   Transmigration   Tsundere   Weak to Strong   Wealthy Characters
author: Hanmen Yatou   Humble Servant Girl   寒门丫头
description:
An Jin, who had an water ability from the apocalypse, transmigrates to an interstellar world and becomes a mermaid captured by His Majesty, the Emperor Norman, on the planet Siao. He is careful to play the role of a pet but finds that the interstellar humans are extremely obedient toward the mermaids, not like a pet, but more like a mermaid master. 

His Majesty Norman also discovers something special about the little mermaid as he gets along, and An Jin’s secrets gradually shine through… 

This is a novel in which a mermaid and human are interdependent with each other, but are unable to communicate, resulting in a heartwarming cognitive difference. The overall story is light and warm, but not lacking in excitement, and the text is very smooth. It depicts a fairy-tale love story, sweet and warm.>
